resources.string: Mobile phone users often experience unpleasant phone calls,messages or alerts late in the night or in the middle of a meeting which could disturb their sleep or drag their attention away.Also users often miss calls when they forget to reset the phone from mute to normal after meetings.

SmartMute has a solution.It helps the users sleep with peace of mind or attend meetings without any interference from the mobile phone by setting the profile to mute for a predefined duration.SmartMute also set the profile back to normal when the predefined time expires.

Users need to set start time and end time.During this time period, the profile will be turned to mute. Users will receive notifications when the profile is changed.SmartMute also has an option to repeat the settings throughout the week.
SmartMute uses minimal disk space and battery requirements.There may be a minute delay if OS is busy.
